timeline.bodyHTML:
I'd rather suggest keeping TransformerUtil as is and including the xml declaration if necessary due to encoding difference. This is few bytes difference yet that can be helpful in redirect binding.

Suggested change
transformer.setOutputProperty(OutputKeys.ENCODING, xmlEncoding);
transformer.setOutputProperty(OutputKeys.ENCODING, xmlEncoding);
transformer.setOutputProperty(OutputKeys.OMIT_XML_DECLARATION, "no");
